snippet: ECKSTEIN--Ruthann, loving and beloved wife of our partner Kenneth Eckstein, died on Thursday, April 7, 2016. We join Ken and his boys, Max, Sam and Zach, in mourning the loss of a woman who should have lived fifty more years to grace her family and community. Ruthann was a strong and devoted matriarch, a pillar of her religious and social communities and a person of kindness and beauty. Our hearts are heavy as we extend condolences to Ruthann's close family and friends. Kramer Levin Naftalis & Frankel 1/3
